ygData.subject: Spring cleaning
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine and Foxfingers walk down the hall until they reach a large room. It appears to be a storage facility but the lack of supplies made it open. There

Lunarpine and Foxfingers walk down the hall until they reach a large room.
It appears to be a storage facility but the lack of supplies made it open.
There were a few boxxes of material but not enough to make the room look
full. "I've got an idea." Lunarpine states, stareing at the boxxes. "Is
there anywhere we could move these to?" he picks up the first box.

Foxfingers looks inside the box, there wasn't anything of immediate
importance in it so he didn't see any reason to keep it there. "Theres
another storage room down the hall." he picks up a box, curious about
Lunarpines idea.

The wolfbot and the foxbot quickly emptied the room. thier voices echoed off
the bare walls. "You up for a game?" He asked smiling for the first time
since he found out that Shadow Wing was alright.

"What kind of game?" The curious fox asked back, suspicious of the wolfbots
motives.

"Tag, and you're it." He slapped Foxfingers in the back of the head,
transformed to wolf and took off running across the floor.

Foxfingers jumped on his hoverboard and began the chase yelling out the
words "You son of a...." (Proper usage of the phrase above.)
